Downhill Mountain Bike Events

Events UK downhill series returns for 2019 with four rounds in the North East and Wales.

Find Out More
  • About
  • Our Offers
  • Gallery
  • Contact

We've made what you need!

The original and classic British Mountain Bike Event, now in its 5th year. Promoted & organised by FreeRiders Cycling Club. Our event is aimed at experienced riders – routes of 100km, 75km or 50km and run over challenging routes across the hills, using a combination of roads, tracks and bridleways, with significant off-road sections.

Our Prize Draw aims to encourage young riders to enter and we have again teamed up with the great guys.

Join us!

Our Offers

Prize Pool $50000

The winner takes home $30000 in prize money.
The second place takes $15000 and the third takes $5000.
Other participants will receive specials presents.

Free Diagnostics

Professionals will test your bike and give advice on what needs to be improved.

Respect

A medal will be awarded to all finishers.

Made with Love

There are a lot of special tracks, qualified staffs, relaxing rooms and mobile-cafes.

Stay in touch!

Check our website for more recent details and contacts when it appears. We work hard to make it all on time. Good luck and see you at our event!
